name: Stealth (A game made in 15 hours)
description:
Hello! This is definitely a terrible game and I know that. I tried to make this in 15 hours, which is ambitious. This is the first time I've ever tried this, and my time management was off. So there are bugs like, enemies spawning on each other, audio not playing properly, and glitchy object spawning. Otherwise, Enjoy!

Objective: Get the resources while avoiding the sight of the enemies

Game starts with one enemy, then more and more enemies spawn, making it more difficult to sneak.

Controls:
W-A-S-D or Arrow Keys

Scoring:

Silver - 2 Points
Gold - 10 Points
Emerald - 20 Points
Diamond - 40 Points

Powerups:

Boots - Increase Speed
Wall+ - Add Walls (Glitchy)
